version_description: Minor fixes to improve our user interface. Hope you enjoy the app.
Oh behold, a super upgrade of our backend - and a little tuning of the app. We appreciate all your feedback, please continue to submit any ideas or feedback you have to support@stockalertapp.com
A few internal improvements. Thanks for using Stock Alert!
An upgrade to our backend. You must update to this version to be able to create new alarms. Sorry for the trouble, please contact us on support@stockalertapp.com if any questions. Enjoy!

Minor internal improvements that removes a bug related to sign up. Go ahead and jump right in ;-)

You are always welcome to reach out on support@stockalertapp.com if you need help or have feedback for us. Rgds, Martin - Stock Alert.

Improved the UI so it is now easier to enter target values and edit existing alarms. Also added two new languages, Stock Alert is available in native language for our French and Spanish speaking users. 

We have started working on a more detailed view for each asset, that (when released) will appear on opening the app from an alert push. What would you like to view in detail here? You are most welcome to email your suggestions using the Help menu in our app.
In this release we tuned our app a bit, so it's more stable. Happy investing!
Internal performance upgrades, please upgrade to this version to secure optimal operation of your alarms.
Adding many new features! See exchange status, sort/filter your alarms, add notes and tags, view charts and fundamental data, technical indicators, customize your alarm sound and more. Enjoy!
Making our unique alert sound default for all.
